price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ tẹ̀lé ti Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀. Ẹ má ṣe gbúnrí kúrò ní ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ̀ nígbà tí ẹ bá ń gbọ́ (āyah) lọ́wọ́.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu walā tawallaw ʿanhu wa-antum tasmaʿūna
